instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3024: What is 820-3024? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.SMC_LID: What is SMC_LID? SMC_LID tells the machine the system is open when it is 3.3v to 3.4v, and closed when it is low such as 0v-0.6v. When this signal is low, the machine may go to sleep or have no backlight. .

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3024</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> keyboard trackpad not workin
threads.message:
Hi guys, 

Have macbook air 11 with no liquid damage. The problem is that keyboard and trackpad only works if you boot with option key on disk selection. After that in OS not working, Already tried new keyboard, new trackpad, new flex. Not working. Trackpad is good because it works on other macbook. 

Checked pin by pin J5700 with all resistor and also changed <CHIP>U5700</CHIP> but still not working. I have no idea what more can i do. L5710 also is ok and has continuity.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3024</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> keyboard trackpad not workin
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3024</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> keyboard trackpad not workin
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3024</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> keyboard trackpad not workin
threads.message:
Very strange, as in this case no SPI mode available for TP/KB communication.
All the time USB mode is used.
Check pin 10 of <CHIP>U5700</CHIP>.
Try TP alone, disconnecting KB from its board.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3024</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> keyboard trackpad not workin
threads.message:
already tried only trackpad. Will check <CHIP>U5700</CHIP> tomorrow and back with result. Thanks. 

Yes, very strange, i solved many issues like this on 3437 and 00165 but this one is the worst case of tp/kb not working.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3024</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> keyboard trackpad not workin
threads.message: Pin 10 3,2 V and stable. No Idea what more it can be.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3024</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> keyboard trackpad not workin
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3024</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> keyboard trackpad not workin
threads.message: Solved. <CHIP>U5700</CHIP> was ok. It was <CHIP>U2650</CHIP>. Changed it and now all works fine. Thanks
